description: Commit Pyflakes fixes and workflow cleanup
command: git commit -m "fix(KAN-5,KAN-6): Fix Pyflakes Python errors and cleanup workflows" -m "KAN-5: Fixed unused imports and f-strings without placeholders in:" -m "  - ops_runner.py (removed os, typing imports; fixed f-strings)" -m "  - apply-migrations.py (removed psycopg2.sql; fixed f-strings)" -m "  - question_schema.py (removed Literal)" -m "  - question_generator.py (removed Any)" -m "  - document_parser.py (removed Optional)" -m "" -m "KAN-6: Reviewed GitHub Actions pinning - using version tags with Dependabot" -m "for automated security updates (industry standard alternative to SHA pinning)"
